title: Fragments, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: printed on satin weave
description: Ivory ground with a border design printed in green, red, pink, purple, orange and blue. Arches of feathery foliage and small round blossoms, berries and buds.

Fragments, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk
